title: How to Watch the Golden Globes 2026 Nominations
summary: Awards season is upon us, as the nominees for the 83rd annual Golden Globes will be revealed on the morning of Monday, Dec. 8. All 28 categories will be announced at 8:15 a.m. ET/5:15 a.m. PT on CBSNews.com. 11 exclusive film and TV categories will also be announced in a live televised event at 8:3â€¦
